title: This Wukong Jungle Build......

replies.body: Cinderhulk is trash on Wu especially when you're only building one other HP item
its for jungle clears and a bit of health.
just get a {{item:2032}} and his clear is fine

HAve you ever tried {{champion:90}} {{item:3814}} {{item:3102}} 
Super fun, ever since they ruined him in mid and jg Ive wanted to try it
I can only imagine those combined with his passive shield block.
Derpblade of clonespam just got fixed.
